title: Colts' fake punt among NFL's dumbest plays
text:
> Top News Colts' fake punt among NFL's dumbest plays FILE - In this Nov. 19, 1978, file photo, Philadelphia Eagles' Herman Edwards (46) pounces on the ball fumbled by New York Giants quarterback Joe Pisarcik (9) during an NFL football game in East Rutherford, N.J. The Eagles won 19-17. (AP Photo/G. Paul Burnett, File) Search Help
